bill_title: expressing support for the 2021 South Dakota Coordinated Plan for Natural Resources Conservation.

bill_versions.bill_text: A CONCURRENT RESOLUTION, expressing support for the 2021 South Dakota Coordinated Plan for Natural Resources Conservation. WHEREAS, the state's natural resources serve as the foundation for our quality of life and economic well-being; and WHEREAS, our current enjoyment of these natural resources comes with an obligation to ensure that future generations are blessed with the same opportunity; and WHEREAS, the state's conservation districts, together with the State Conservation Commission and various conservation partners, have created a coordinated plan that articulates a framework within which all South Dakotans can work together to protect and enhance the state's natural resources; and WHEREAS, the 2021 South Dakota Coordinated Plan for Natural Resources Conservation includes broad goals and objectives, and provides for their achievement through the promotion and incorporation of local flexibility; NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT RESOLVED, by the Senate of the Ninety-Seventh Legislature of the State of South Dakota, the House of Representatives concurring therein, that the need to ensure the sustained conservation and wise and thoughtful use of this state's natural resources is recognized, acknowledged, and strongly encouraged through support for the 2021 South Dakota Coordinated Plan for Natural Resources Conservation.

A CONCURRENT RESOLUTION, expressing support for the 2021 South Dakota Coordinated Plan for Natural Resources Conservation. WHEREAS, the state's natural resources serve as the foundation for our quality of life and economic well-being; and WHEREAS, our current enjoyment of these natural resources comes with an obligation to ensure that future generations are blessed with the same opportunity; and WHEREAS, the state's conservation districts, together with the State Conservation Commission and various conservation partners, have created a coordinated plan that articulates a framework within which all South Dakotans can work together to protect and enhance the state's natural resources; and WHEREAS, the 2021 South Dakota Coordinated Plan for Natural Resources Conservation includes broad goals and objectives, and provides for their achievement through the promotion and incorporation of local flexibility: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT RESOLVED, by the Senate of the Ninety-Seventh Legislature of the State of South Dakota, the House of Representatives concurring therein, that the need to ensure the sustained conservation and wise and thoughtful use of this state's natural resources is recognized, acknowledged, and strongly encouraged through support for the 2021 South Dakota Coordinated Plan for Natural Resources Conservation. Adopted by the Senate, January 31, 2022 Concurred in by the House of Representatives, February 9, 2022 _____________________ _____________________ Larry Rhoden Kay Johnson President of the Senate Secretary of the Senate _____________________ _____________________ Spencer Gosch Patricia Miller Speaker of the House Chief Clerk
